label: 五節の舞姫
本: The Clear Mirror:  A Chronicle of Japanese Court During the Kamakura Period, (1185-1333) . Stanford University Press . 1998
説明文: Five girls (or four, in the case of the first fruits service), each the protegee of a member of the court, who performed during the great thanksgiving and first fruits festivities. Their rehearsals were major events.
